sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_REPORTING(
TITLE, REPORTER, REPORT_TIME, REPORT_TYPE, CONTEXT, CHECKER, OWNER, STEPS, INFORMRE,
ID, STATUS, CREATED, CREATE_TIME, UPDATED, UPDATE_TIME, ORG, ORG_TREE) values(
#title#, #reporter#, #reportTime#, #reportType#, #context#, #checker#, #owner#, #steps#, #informre#,
#id#, #status#, #created#, #createTime#, #updated#, #updateTime#, #org#, #orgTree#)
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE TB_REPORTING SET STATUS='0' WHERE ID=#id#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
TB_REPORTING.TITLE AS title, TB_REPORTING.REPORTER AS reporter, TB_REPORTING.REPORT_TIME AS reportTime, TB_REPORTING.REPORT_TYPE AS reportType, TB_REPORTING.CONTEXT AS context, TB_REPORTING.CHECKER AS checker, TB_REPORTING.OWNER AS owner, TB_REPORTING.STEPS AS steps, TB_REPORTING.INFORMRE AS informre,
TB_REPORTING.ID AS id, TB_REPORTING.STATUS AS status, TB_REPORTING.CREATED AS created, TB_REPORTING.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, TB_REPORTING.UPDATED AS updated, TB_REPORTING.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime from TB_REPORTING where TB_REPORTING.ID=#id#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE TB_REPORTING
TITLE=#title# REPORTER=#reporter# REPORT_TIME=#reportTime# REPORT_TYPE=#reportType# CONTEXT=#context# CHECKER=#checker# OWNER=#owner# STEPS=#steps# INFORMRE=#informre#
ID=#id# STATUS=#status# CREATED=#created# CREATE_TIME=#createTime# UPDATED=#updated# UPDATE_TIME=#updateTime#
WHERE ID=#id#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
TB_REPORTING.TITLE AS title, TB_REPORTING.REPORTER AS reporter, TB_REPORTING.REPORT_TIME AS reportTime, TB_REPORTING.REPORT_TYPE AS reportType, TB_REPORTING.CONTEXT AS context, TB_REPORTING.CHECKER AS checker, TB_REPORTING.OWNER AS owner, TB_REPORTING.STEPS AS steps, TB_REPORTING.INFORMRE AS informre,
TB_REPORTING.ID AS id, TB_REPORTING.STATUS AS status, TB_REPORTING.CREATED AS created, TB_REPORTING.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, TB_REPORTING.UPDATED AS updated, TB_REPORTING.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime FROM TB_REPORTING WHERE TB_REPORTING.STATUS = '1'
SELECT count(*) FROM TB_REPORTING WHERE TB_REPORTING.STATUS = '1'
